definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Cattle in North Korea being checked for signs of FMD.
sentences.chinese: 正在查看朝鮮的牛是否有口蹄疫症狀。

sentences.english: Transgenic plant as plant-derived vaccine is prospect in the production of FMD vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用轉基因植物生產植物源性的口蹄疫疫苗前景廣闊。

sentences.english: The festival was canceled last year due to hoof-and-mouth disease.
sentences.chinese: 這個節日去年因爲口蹄疫而停擺。

sentences.english: A natural outbreak of hoof and-mouth disease devastated the livestock industry in the United Kingdom a few years ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前在英國自然爆發的口蹄疫疾病破壞了牲畜業。

sentences.english: HFMD is often confused with foot-and-mouth disease of cattle sheep and swine.
sentences.chinese: 手足口病經常容易與牛羊豬的口蹄疫混淆。

sentences.english: Just the mention of foot-and-mouth leaves many British farmers with a chill.
sentences.chinese: 一說起口蹄疫，英國農場主們就膽寒。

sentences.english: As following, we summarized the progress of FMDV transgenic plant vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 文章綜述了國內外口蹄疫轉基因植物疫苗研究的成果。

sentences.english: The pigs are all dying off from foot-and-mouth disease.
sentences.chinese: 這些豬都一隻只地死於口蹄疫。

sentences.english: Food-and-mouth disease of cattle could be transmitted by bacteria-free filtrates.
sentences.chinese: 牛的口蹄疫能被無細菌的濾液傳播。

sentences.english: Did you know that your country has been under threat of foot-and-mouth disease?
sentences.chinese: 你是否知道你的國家正在被口蹄疫陰雲籠罩。

sentences.english: Foot- and –mouth disease has become a hot topic of gossip.
sentences.chinese: 口蹄疫成了街談巷議的熱門話題。

definition: porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome (PRRS)/blue-ear swine fever
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
